column1: }}'''The Hunt for Gollum''' is a fan film based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. The film focuses on the events prior to ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' but after ''[[The Hobbit]]'' as [[Aragorn]] tracks down [[Gollum]]. Featured characters include [[Aragorn]], [[Gandalf]], [[Arwen]] and [[Gollum]], with new characters ''Arithir'', and ''Goblok''. The film was made available to download for free on [[3 May
As Gandalf learns the truth about the ring in Frodo's possession, he dispatches Aragorn to find and capture the creature Gollum, the ring's former carrier.
Music by Adam Langston and Andrew Skrabutenas, based on music by [[Howard Shore]] and [[Requiem for a Tower
